title: [Western DragonSpine, Cliff]
description: A rough precipice juts out from the mountainside, creating a ledge above.  Tufts of sturdy grasses grow out of dirt that has collected in the crevices of the rock.  The moonlight glows softly on the sea of mist in the valley below.

A rough precipice juts out from the mountainside, creating a ledge above.  Tufts of sturdy grasses grow out of dirt that has collected in the crevices of the rock.  A sea of white mist floats near the floor of the valley below, tendrils of the mist whirling and dissipating above the surface.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
tags: meta:mapname:Elven Nations - Trail (Locksmehr River/West of Dragonspine)
